entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SPRINKLES THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS

CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY

LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
